metadata.text1:
- Stop any active bleeding
- Keep warm
- Support feeding
metadata.text3:
- Severe anaemia - paper white appearance
- Associated respiratory distress
- Signs of heart failure
- Hb less than ....

If blood products not available give IV fluids

Prescribe iron but not if the baby has high fever & sepsis - wait for acute infection to settle
metadata.title1: 1. Limit blood loss and supportive care
metadata.title2: 2. Send FBC, Group and cross match
